oracle.adf.model.adapter.dataformat
Class FormatDataEvent

java.lang.Object
  oracle.adf.model.adapter.dataformat.FormatDataEvent
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSVHandler.CSVDataEvent, XMLHandler.XMLDataEvent
public class FormatDataEvent
extends java.lang.Object

Format data events are thrown by format data handlers during data access.

Since:
10.1.3.1
See Also:
FormatDataEventListener, FormatDataHandler

          Constructs an event with a name and data associted with the event.
